languages.text: "Не вздумай сдаваться — борись!" {n}Лицо Соломона искажает не то мука, не то отчаяние.{/n} "Ты лучший техножрец, которого я знаю — ты не можешь вот так... В конце концов, кому кроме тебя я могу доверить Глейто? Ксеносы тоже добрались до него".

"Don't you dare give up! Keep fighting!" {n}Solomorne's face contorts in what is either anguish or despair.{/n} "You are the best Tech-Priest I know. You can't just... Who else am I going to trust to help Glaito? The xenos got to him too."
languages.original_text: "Не вздумай сдаваться — борись!" {n}Лицо Соломона искажает не то мука, не то отчаяние.{/n} "Ты лучший техножрец, которого я знаю — ты не можешь вот так... В конце концов, кому кроме тебя я могу доверить Глейто? Ксеносы тоже добрались до него".

traits.locale_text: "Don't you dare give up! Keep fighting!" {n}Solomorne's face contorts in either anguish or despair.{/n} "You are the best Tech-Priest I know, you can't just... Who else am I going to trust to help Glaito? The xenos got to him too."

"Don't you dare give up! Keep fighting!" {n}Solomorne's face contorts in either anguish or despair.{/n} "You are the best Tech-Priest I know, you can't just... Who else am I going to trust to help Glaito? The xenos got to him too."

"Don't you dare give up! Keep fighting!" {n}Solomorne's face contorts in what is either anguish or despair.{/n} "You are the best Tech-Priest I know. You can't just... Who else am I going to trust to help Glaito? The xenos got to him too."

"Don't you dare give up! Keep fighting!" {n}Solomorne's face contorts in what is either anguish or despair.{/n} "You are the best Tech-Priest I know. You can't just... Who else am I going to trust to help Glaito? The xenos got to him too."

"Don't you dare give up! Keep fighting!" {n}Solomorne's face contorts in what is either anguish or despair.{/n} "You are the best Tech-Priest I know. You can't just... Who else am I going to trust to help Glaito? The xenos got to him too."

"Don't you dare give up! Keep fighting!" {n}Solomorne's face contorts in what is either anguish or despair.{/n} "You are the best Tech-Priest I know. You can't just... Who else am I going to trust to help Glaito? The xenos got to him too."

languages.text: “不准放弃！继续战斗！”{n}索罗蒙的脸扭曲着，或许是出于痛苦，又或许是出于绝望。{/n}“你是我见过最出色的技术神甫，你不能就这样……要是你不在了，还有谁能帮格雷托？那些异形也害了它。”
languages.original_text: "Don't you dare give up! Keep fighting!" {n}Solomorne's face contorts in what is either anguish or despair.{/n} "You are the best Tech-Priest I know. You can't just... Who else am I going to trust to help Glaito? The xenos got to him too."

traits.locale_text: “不准放弃！继续战斗！”{n}索罗蒙的脸扭曲着，或许是出于痛苦，又或许是出于绝望。{/n}“你是我见过最出色的技术神甫，你不能就这样……要是你不在了，还有谁能帮格雷托？那些异形也害了它。”

languages.text: «¡No se atreva a rendirse! ¡Siga luchando!». {n}El rostro de Solomorne se tuerce, no sabes si más por sufrimiento o desesperación.{/n} «Usted es el mejor tecnosacerdote que conozco. No puede... ¿A quién, si no, voy a acudir para ayudar a Glaito? Los xenos también lo han torturado».
languages.original_text: "Don't you dare give up! Keep fighting!" {n}Solomorne's face contorts in what is either anguish or despair.{/n} "You are the best Tech-Priest I know. You can't just... Who else am I going to trust to help Glaito? The xenos got to him too."

traits.locale_text: «¡No se atreva a rendirse! ¡Siga luchando!». {n}El rostro de Solomorne se tuerce, no sabes si más por sufrimiento o desesperación.{/n} «Usted es el mejor tecnosacerdote que conozco. No puede... ¿A quién, si no, voy a acudir para ayudar a Glaito? Los xenos también lo han torturado».

languages.text: « Ne vous avisez pas d'abandonner ! Résistez ! » {n}s'exclame Solomorne, le visage déformé par l'angoisse ou le désespoir.{/n} « Vous êtes le meilleur technoprêtre que je connaisse. Vous ne pouvez pas... Qui d'autre saura s'occuper de Glaito ? Le xénos a mis la main sur lui aussi. »
languages.original_text: "Don't you dare give up! Keep fighting!" {n}Solomorne's face contorts in what is either anguish or despair.{/n} "You are the best Tech-Priest I know. You can't just... Who else am I going to trust to help Glaito? The xenos got to him too."

traits.locale_text: « Ne vous avisez pas d'abandonner ! Résistez ! » {n}s'exclame Solomorne, le visage déformé par l'angoisse ou le désespoir.{/n} « Vous êtes le meilleur technoprêtre que je connaisse. Vous ne pouvez pas... Qui d'autre saura s'occuper de Glaito ? Le xénos a mis la main sur lui aussi. »

languages.text: 「諦めるな！戦い続けろ！」{n}ソロモーンの顔が、苦悩とも絶望ともつかない表情に歪んだ。{/n}「お前は俺が知っている中で最高の技術司祭だ。こんな形で終わるなんて…グライトを助けられるのはお前しかいない。異種族の奴らが、あいつまで弄りやがったんだ」
languages.original_text: "Don't you dare give up! Keep fighting!" {n}Solomorne's face contorts in what is either anguish or despair.{/n} "You are the best Tech-Priest I know. You can't just... Who else am I going to trust to help Glaito? The xenos got to him too."

traits.locale_text: 「諦めるな！戦い続けろ！」{n}ソロモーンの顔が、苦悩とも絶望ともつかない表情に歪んだ。{/n}「お前は俺が知っている中で最高の技術司祭だ。こんな形で終わるなんて…グライトを助けられるのはお前しかいない。異種族の奴らが、あいつまで弄りやがったんだ」

languages.text: "Sakın pes edeyim deme! Savaşmaya devam et!" {n}Solomorne'un yüzü, ızdırap veya çaresizliğe benzer bir ifadeye bürünüyor.{/n} "Senden iyi bir Tekno Rahip daha tanımadım. Böylece gidemez... Glaito'ya yardım etmek için başka kime güveneceğim? Zenolar ona da eriştiler."
languages.original_text: "Don't you dare give up! Keep fighting!" {n}Solomorne's face contorts in what is either anguish or despair.{/n} "You are the best Tech-Priest I know. You can't just... Who else am I going to trust to help Glaito? The xenos got to him too."

traits.locale_text: "Sakın pes edeyim deme! Savaşmaya devam et!" {n}Solomorne'un yüzü ızdırap veya çaresizliğe benzer bir ifadeye bürünüyor.{/n} "Sen tanıdığım en iyi Tekno Rahip'sin. Böylece gidemez... Glaito'ya yardım etmek için başka kime güveneceğim? Zenolar ona da eriştiler."

languages.text: "Wagt es ja nicht, aufzugeben! Kämpft weiter!" {n}Solomornes Gesicht ist verzerrt – Schmerz oder Verzweiflung?{/n} "Ihr seid der beste Techpriester, den ich kenne. Ihr könnt nicht einfach ... Wem kann ich sonst vertrauen, dass er Glaito hilft? Die Xenos haben ihn auch erwischt."
languages.original_text: "Don't you dare give up! Keep fighting!" {n}Solomorne's face contorts in what is either anguish or despair.{/n} "You are the best Tech-Priest I know. You can't just... Who else am I going to trust to help Glaito? The xenos got to him too."

traits.locale_text: "Wagt es ja nicht, aufzugeben! Kämpft weiter!" {n}Solomornes Gesicht ist verzerrt – Schmerz oder Verzweiflung?{/n} "Ihr seid der beste Techpriester, den ich kenne. Ihr könnt nicht einfach ... Wem kann ich sonst vertrauen, dass er Glaito hilft? Die Xenos haben ihn auch erwischt."
